#summary Installation instructions

= Installation Instructions =


= Software - Mandatory =

  * [www.python.org Python]
  * [www.fenicsproject.org FEniCS/Dolfin] - FEM assembly
  * [www.scipy.org Scipy] - Matrices assembly
  * [http://www.code.google.com/p/pyamg PyAmg] - Solver for linear equations system
  * [http://www.davidashen.net/rnv.html RNV] - XML file check against grammar

= Software - Optional =

 * [www.geuz.org/gmsh Gmsh] - Mesh Generation
 * [www.paraview.org Paraview] - Results Visualization
 * [subversion.tigris.org svn] - Code version management
